confidence_rationale: Provides a principled separation between expected and unexpected uncertainty channels, consistent with multiple control-plane axes rather than a single scalar modulation.

mapping.source_claim_statement: The paper proposes separable neuromodulatory roles in signaling expected versus unexpected uncertainty for attentional control.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports Q-017 by motivating orthogonal control axes in REE instead of a monolithic control knob.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Computational and systems-level argument; not a full causal pathway isolation for every axis in REE.
